title: Can we address how broken fiora is?
body: like I don't see the difference between fiora and tank yasuo. She has speed and power. She buys one life steal item and it gives her to much life. I mean I've fought her with grievous wound and lifesteal and still she beat me in a lifesteal contest. The rest of her build is just pure tank. Like I don't see how her kit is any less mobile in a fight then yasuo's. She isn't a late game champion so she will easily fight well off the bat. Like She does a shit ton of  damage and remains just as tanky as yasuo was. easy and free trade without fear.

replies.body: Except she is a late game champion, she doesn't build tank, and she only has a 51% win rate with people with over 125 games on her.
I find fiora a tad bit on the weak side right now. No where near broken. She's in an okay spot.
